title: Creative Lead (UX/UI)
overview: The Creative Lead (UX/UI) at Superside leads and guides a team of designers, sets creative vision and standards, manages design process, and collaborates with cross-functional teams to ensure objectives are met, with strong skills in UX/UI design, leadership, and problem-solving mindset.
description:
As the UX/UI Creative Lead at Superside, you'll have the opportunity to lead and guide our team of UX/UI designers. We work on significant strategic projects spanning from creating stunning mobile & web apps, landing pages, dashboards, and other digital products for our global brands like Meta, Google, Amazon or Twitch. 


In this role, you will work with our globally distributed team of top-talent creatives with plenty of professional growth opportunities.

extras.title: What You'll Do
content: Lead and mentor a team of UX/UI designers
Set the creative vision and standards for all UX/UI projects
Manage the design process, from conceptual design to prototyping
Work cross-functionally with other teams to ensure designs meet objectives
Excellent English verbal and written communication skills to present and explain designs and deliverables to peers, executive stakeholders and customers
Oversee and provide feedback on design deliverables
Encourage a culture of innovation and improvement within the team
Understanding of front-end languages: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript is a plus
Problem-solving mindset with a focus on user-centered design
Knowledge of automation process is a plus
Strong experience in Complex Design System development
Proven experience in working alongside with development team

extras.title: What You'll Need To Succeed
content: Bachelor's degree in Design, or similar education
7+ years of experience as a UX/UI Designer, with 2+ years in a leadership role
Strong portfolio showcasing your UX/UI design skills
Expertise in design software such as Figma, and Adobe Creative Suite
Excellent visual design skills with a focus on user-system interaction
Proven experience leading and managing a team of designers
Strong communication, presentation, and leadership skills
Excellent problem-solving abilities with a user-centric mindset
Analyzing stakeholders around the vision of the Digital ecosystem
Be able to prioritize functions and features among websites
